ISSUE.TITLE: in taskflow-modeler GUI editor task details come up blank after I collapse details panel
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: in taskflow-modeler GUI editor task details come up blank after I collapse details panel Try collapsing and expanding it back. Thanks

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix package name in log4j.properties file (#200)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fixes #180 & #184 (#196) * disable decision table instance info fetch * minor tab header style issue fix * added deployment and parent deployment id to decision table view * fixes #184 added resize delay to avoid timing issues * fixes wrong controller reference * fixed Flowable cookie filter when no privileges found redirect was executed 2 times * fixed http interceptors they did not return a promise which prevented error handling * changed file upload to default error handling * added authenticated false * upped timeout value
